name: ListUserBusyTimes
description:
Retrieve user's scheduled events in a date range.

Get an ascending list of user's internal and external events within a specified date range, up to 7 days. External events are returned for configured calendars only.

parameters.name: user_uri
parameters.description: The URI associated with the user to retrieve busy times for.

value_schema.description: The uri associated with the user

parameters.name: availability_start_time
parameters.description: Start time of the requested availability range. The date cannot be in the past and must be formatted correctly.

value_schema.description: Start time of the requested availability range. Date cannot be in the past.

parameters.name: availability_end_time
parameters.description: End time for the requested availability range; must be after the start time.

value_schema.description: End time of the requested availability range. Date must be in the future of start_time.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the calendly API.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The uri associated with the user

value_schema.description: The uri associated with the user

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Start time of the requested availability range. Date cannot be in the past.

value_schema.description: Start time of the requested availability range. Date cannot be in the past.

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: End time of the requested availability range. Date must be in the future of start_time.

value_schema.description: End time of the requested availability range. Date must be in the future of start_time.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
